title: Lesson 1 – Pokémon Lab Test
scene: Ash finally reaches Professor Oak’s lab. He tries to pick his first Pokémon… but things don’t go as planned.

script.speaker: A
script.text: I thought a lot… and I finally decided to choose [Squirtle].

script.speaker: B
script.text: Hmm… there is a problem. That one is already [gone].

script.speaker: A
script.text: No way! Is there any Pokémon [left]?

script.speaker: B
script.text: Well… there is still one. But it's a little… [different].

twist: Pikachu sparks electricity for no reason.
There is a strange sound behind the machine.
